name: Pirate Babe
description:
Pirate Babe 

The quest for booty

Avast! Your pirate babe has been stolen by the evil seamen that have a different ship color than you and are selling seawater that the babe swam in. Destroy them with your big cannonballs and fight your way back trough the unforgiving seas to fetch back what belongs to you. Yourrre pirate babe booty!
